SEARCH
Package Customer

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
Customer.Customer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICustomerOrderProcess, Serializable
public class Customer extends Object implements ICustomerOrderProcess, Serializable
Represents a customer who can browse menus, add items to cart, place orders, track orders, and collect orders. Implements interface for Customer Order Processing.
See Also:
